LanguageData.Arrow_Short_Stun.label: Stun Arrow (Short Bow)
LanguageData.Bow_Short_Stun.label: Stun Short Bow
LanguageData.Bow_Short_Stun.description: Primitive technology combined with advanced technology. A short bow which you can shoot arrows with that will make your prey unconscious.
LanguageData.Arrow_Giant.label: Giant Arrow (Giant Bow)
LanguageData.Bow_Giant.label: Giant Bow
LanguageData.Bow_Giant.description: A ruthless bow with an incredible power. The Giant Bow, unsuitable for every hunter, the use of this bow is associated with a great responsibility. With this bow can be fired mighty arrows, which will destroy their target. A safety clearance must be maintained when using this bow otherwise there is a high risk of life!
LanguageData.Arrow_Fire.label: Fire Arrow (Short Bow)
LanguageData.Bow_Fire.label: Fire Short Bow
LanguageData.Bow_Fire.description: Ein fortschrittlicher Bogen mit Feuerpfeilen. Dieser Bogen ist ein Kampfbogen, weniger ein Jagdbogen, da das Ziel Feuer fängt und womöglich ein Waldbrand auslöst.
LanguageData.Arrow_Toxic.label: Toxic Arrow (Short Bow)
LanguageData.Bow_Toxic.label: Toxic Short Bow
LanguageData.Bow_Toxic.description: An advanced bow with toxic arrows. This bow is a hunting bow, less a combat bow, since the target is poisoned and dies without treatment. However, if enough poison can be concentrated, the bow can also be a serious threat in combat.
